org.assertj.swing.driver

Class JPopupMenuDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.driver.ComponentDriver
      • org.assertj.swing.driver.ContainerDriver
        • org.assertj.swing.driver.JComponentDriver
          • org.assertj.swing.driver.JPopupMenuDriver

  • @InternalApi
public class JPopupMenuDriver
extends JComponentDriver

    Supports functional testing of JPopupMenus.

    Note: This class is intended for internal use only. Please use the classes in the package org.assertj.swing.fixture in your tests.

    Author:
    Yvonne Wang, Alex Ruiz

      • menuItem

        @RunsInEDT
 @Nonnull
public JMenuItem menuItem(@Nonnull
                                               JPopupMenu popupMenu,
                                               @Nullable
                                               String name)
        Finds a JMenuItem, contained in the Container, which name matches the specified one.
        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the target JPopupMenu.
        name - the name to match.
        Returns:
        the JMenuItem found.
        Throws:
        ComponentLookupException - if a JMenuItem having a matching name could not be found.
        ComponentLookupException - if more than one JMenuItem having a matching name is found.

      • menuItem

        @Nonnull
public JMenuItem menuItem(@Nonnull
                                   JPopupMenu popupMenu,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   GenericTypeMatcher<? extends JMenuItem> matcher)
        Finds a JMenuItem, contained in the Container, that matches the specified search criteria.
        Parameters:
        popupMenu - the target JPopupMenu.
        matcher - contains the search criteria for finding a JMenuItem.
        Returns:
        the JMenuItem found.
        Throws:
        ComponentLookupException - if a JMenuItem that matches the given search criteria could not be found. Or if more than one JMenuItem that matches the given search criteria is found.
